title: PR suspends Quetta-Taftan train service: Sheikh Rashid
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 26 (APP):Minister for Railways Sheikh Rahsid Ahmed Wednesday said that Pakistan Railways has suspended Quetta-Taftan train service.
In a statement, he said the four trains running between Quetta and Taftan has been closed as the Taftan â€“Quetta border traffic would remain closed till further orders.
He asked the passengers to get back their luggage and other material.
